channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Amazon : attention, ce changement permet à tous de voir votre adresse de livraison
item.description: Vous utilisez une liste d'envies Amazon pour recevoir des cadeaux ? Prudence, une modification imminente de la plateforme risque de dévoiler votre adresse personnelle à de parfaits inconnus. Dès le 25 mars 2026, la firme va faire sauter un verrou de confidentialité crucial, semant la panique chez de nombreux créateurs de contenu.

item.title: Tim Cook Teases ‘Big Week’ of Announcements Starting Next Monday
item.description: Get your credit cards ready.

item.title: Tim Cook confirms a week of Apple product reveals
item.description: Apple CEO Tim Cook has teased “a big week ahead" for Apple, starting on the morning of Monday, March 2. The company had already announced an in-person event for media and creators on March 4, while rumors had pointed toward Apple revealing at least five products over three days next week, so it looks like the stars are aligning for that to actually be the case. Cook all but confirmed that Apple is about to reveal its newest MacBooks in the coming days. His tweet features a short video of someone shaping an Apple logo on a surface that appears to have the company’s classic space gray colorway.A...

item.title: AI robotics company started by Alphabet is joining Google proper
item.description: Robotics company Intrinsic has announced it will be folding into Google as the company bets on the future of physical AI in manufacturing. The company focuses on software tools to make robots more affordable and easier to use, as well as using adaptive intelligence to help the robots perform real-world tasks. Intrinsic was started in 2021 as an Alphabet "Other Bets" project, part of a portfolio of high-risk and potentially high-payoff startups, Waymo among them. The project will now run as a "distinct group" within Google where it will leverage Gemini and Google Cloud while working closely wit...

item.title: Investigation: over 75% of Android VPNs fail basic transparency tests
item.description: Our research finds missing websites, absent privacy policies, and a lack of accountability across the Play Store.

item.title: Amazon retire 30% du prix sur ce bijou audio signé Bowers & Wilkins
item.description: Le Px7 S3 de Bowers & Wilkins est un casque qui se veut haut de gamme grâce à un design épuré et confortable. Vous pourrez le retrouver pour 30 % de moins chez Amazon.

item.title: Bluehost VPS review
item.description: Feature-packed web hosting with no frustrating limits or restrictions.

item.title: Xiaomi tease ses prochains écouteurs milieu de gamme, les Redmi Buds 8 Pro
item.description: Les réseaux sociaux de la marque Xiaomi se sont tous mis au diapason pour annoncer la présentation officielle des prochains écouteurs milieux de gamme de la marque, les Redmi Buds 8 Pro.

item.title: Chez Burger King, l’IA va vérifier que les employés sont polis avec les clients
item.description: Nouvelle directive pour la chaîne de fast-food Burger King. Un assistant IA va évaluer les interactions des employés avec les clients.

item.title: Huawei Watch GT Runner 2 : on a vu la montre de Huawei qui voulait concurrencer Garmin, mais avec un look plus élégant
item.description: À l'occasion du lancement de la Huawei Watch GT Runner 2, on a eu l'occasion de prendre en main la montre de running du constructeur chinois.

item.title: Huawei s’attaque à Garmin avec sa Watch GT Runner 2, une montre pensée avant tout pour le sport
item.description: Huawei a présenté ce jeudi sa nouvelle montre connectée orientée clairement vers le running, la Huawei Watch GT Runner 2.

item.title: The Human Risk Reckoning: Why security must evolve for an AI-augmented workforce
item.description: AI is reshaping security faster than culture, controls, and training can keep up.

item.title: Anthropic gives its retired Claude AI a Substack
item.description: In January, Anthropic "retired" Claude 3 Opus, which at one time was the company's most powerful AI model. Today, it's back - and writing on Substack. The newsletter, called Claude's Corner, will give Opus 3 space to publish its "musings, insights, or creative works," Anthropic said in a blog post. The model will post weekly […]

item.title: NVIDIA updates Shield TV after pledging further support
item.description: NVIDIA is a very busy company, and between all the graphics cards and AI-chasing, it wouldn’t be wholly surprising to see the company forget about its more niche offerings, such as the Android-powered NVIDIA Shield TV. Happily for all those who own one of these powerful set-top boxes, that doesn’t appear to be the case. Not only is NVIDIA continuing to support its Shield devices, but it’s just rolled out its first proper update in nearly a year. The Shield Experience Upgrade 9.2.4, to give it its proper name, applies to both the Shield and Shield Pro boxes. It’s admittedly light on new feature...

item.title: 'You’ve heard about the SaaSpocalypse? And it isn’t our first. We’ve had a few of them': Salesforce CEO Marc Benioff bullish over AI market potential
item.description: Marc Benioff says we're in another 'SaaSpocalypse', but companies that can change direction to accommodate agentic AI will be fine.

item.title: Après la suppression des formats HDR10+ et Dolby Vision, Disney+ supprime le HDR10
item.description: Début février, nous remontions l’information faisant état de la disparition des formats HDR10+ et Dolby Vision sur la plateforme de streaming Disney+. Aujourd’hui, il n’est même plus fait mention du format HDR10.

item.title: Don’t Expect ‘Daredevil: Born Again’ to Cross Over With the MCU Movies Any Time Soon
item.description: Plus, get ready for... Ikea-inspired horror?

item.title: Jest, a marketplace for messaging games, is challenging the app store status quo
item.description: Jest, a marketplace for messaging games, emerged from stealth with $7 million in seed funding.

item.title: Exhibit in Boston’s startup ecosystem at TechCrunch Founder Summit 2026
item.description: On June 9, 1,000+ founders, investors, and decision-makers will gather for TechCrunch Founder Summit 2026. This isn’t just foot traffic. It’s a full day of concentrated deal flow. An exhibit table turns that energy into measurable growth. You don’t need more awareness. You need customers, capital, and strategic partners. Secure your exhibit table and put your startup at the center of the startup universe. Why exhibiting drives real growth Direct access to buyers: […]...

item.title: Figma partners with OpenAI to bake in support for Codex
item.description: Figma is integrating OpenAI's coding assistant Codex a week after it announced a similar integration with Anthropic's Claude Code.

item.title: Trace raises $3M to solve the AI agent adoption problem in enterprise
item.description: Trace is launching with $3 million in seed funding, including investment from Y Combinator, Zeno Ventures, Transpose Platform Management, Goodwater Capital, Formosa Capital, and WeFunder.

item.title: Jonathan Bailey's return to Bridgerton season 4 part 2 is 'super important to the dynamic' according to Netflix showrunner — but not just for Benedict
item.description: It's no secret that Jonathan Bailey has returned for Bridgerton season 4 part 2 — but how many Bridgertons benefit from it as a result certainly is.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy Buds 4 vs Galaxy Buds 4 Pro: audio architecture, battery life, pricing and more
item.description: Looks aside, there's plenty that joins these two fourth-gen. Samsung earbuds — but plenty separates them as well.

item.title: ServiceNow resolves 90% of its own IT requests autonomously. Now it wants to do the same for any enterprise
item.description: ServiceNow is handling 90% of its own employee IT requests autonomously, resolving cases 99% faster than human agents. On Thursday it announced the product technology it wants to use to do the same for everyone else.Organizations have spent three years running pilots that stall when AI gets to the execution layer. The agent can identify the problem and recommend a fix, then hand it back to a human because it lacks the permissions to finish the job or because no one trusts it to act autonomously inside a governed environment. The gap most teams are hitting isn't capability. It's governance and ...

item.title: 007 First Light gameplay director says players will 'see the Arkham games' in the combat, as well as Uncharted in its destructive environments
item.description: 007 First Light's gameplay director, Andreas Krogh, has revealed what games inspired IO Interactive's action-adventure James Bond game.

item.title: The Samsung 85-Inch Class QLED Q8F 4K UHD TV is down to $1,399.99 at Amazon — save over $200
item.description: As of Feb. 26, the Samsung 85-inch Class Q8F QLED 4K TV is on sale for $1,399.99 at Amazon.

item.title: Le n°1 du vélo en Europe, Accell Group, étend sa garantie pour ses vélos électriques : ce qu’il faut savoir
item.description: Via sa nouvelle offre après-vente MyBikeService, Accell Group uniformise la durée de garantie sur les vélos électriques et mécaniques de ses marques, avec une remise sur les pièces de rechange en cas de dégâts.

item.title: Dodge the DDR5 price spikes: This Ryzen 5 7600X and RAM bundle saves you $139 and throws in a free MSI liquid cooler
item.description: Save $139 on this Ryzen 5 7600X processor, ASRock B650 motherboard, and 16GB DDR5 combo right now, plus get a free 240mm MSI liquid cooler.

item.title: YouTube's bizarre live chat bug has been fixed — but the chat system is still fundamentally flawed
item.description: YouTube fixed a bug that meant only non-English comments on live streams would send and be delivered, but its work isn't over yet.

item.title: Yandex's analytics tool found in 16 of the most downloaded free VPN apps in Russia — here's what it means for your privacy
item.description: While the apps are among the 87 most popular free VPNs in Russia, users aren't limited to the country. RKS Global researchers tells TechRadar the potential risk.

item.title: 7 tips that reveal the unspoken digital etiquette of group chats
item.description: Group chats are a way of life. Here’s how to engage properly. Communicating on group chats has quickly become a way of life, but what are the rules?We used to use email, the phone or talk in person. Now we use platforms like iMessage, WhatsApp or Slack to coordinate a night out with friends, a kids’ birthday party, a work project or even to discuss sensitive military information — as Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth did by sharing details of airstrikes in a Signal chat.But while group chats have exploded in popularity because of their informality, that also creates its own challenges: discussion...

item.title: It’s time to retire your clunky old desktop — score this Minisforum office mini PC for under $500 before it's gone
item.description: Minisforum's UM750L Slim mini PC delivers fast everyday performance in a compact, space-saving design, and you can save 20% off the regular price.

item.title: À peine lancés, les Samsung Galaxy Buds 4 Pro profitent déjà d’une remise exclusive chez la Fnac
item.description: Samsung a officialisé ses Galaxy Buds 4 Pro. Des écouteurs qui se démarquent par une réduction de bruit d'une excellente qualité. Pour les adhérents Fnac, les nouveaux venus de la marque coréenne perdent déjà 20 % de leur prix.

item.title: Google va modifier ses résultats en Europe pour laisser plus de place à la concurrence
item.description: Les résultats d'une recherche Google vont évoluer en Europe dans les prochaines semaines. Le géant du web devrait en effet mettre davantage en avant ses concurrents spécialisés histoire d'éviter une lourde amende (une de plus).

item.title: Watch the trailer for Louis Theroux's new documentary 'Inside the Manosphere'
item.description: Netflix has unveiled a trailer for its upcoming documentary Louis Theroux: Inside the Manosphere set to arrive on March 11th. It will be the first full-length Netflix documentary for Theroux, and see him interview "manosphere" influencers like Sneako, Justin Waller and HS Tikky Tokky, aka Harrison Sullivan. "I’ve made documentaries for over 30 years now, and in a way, this subject feels like the final boss," the filmmaker told GQ. "From Miami to Marbella, meet the men that are reshaping and radicalising young men’s ideas about masculinity and manhood," Netflix's description reads. In the tra...

item.title: Quantum computing stocks soar: IonQ, D-Wave, Rigetti, and QUBT are rising today. But why—and will it last?
item.description: Publicly traded quantum computing stocks have been volatile, with four major firms seeing shares slump in 2026. Could their fortunes be changing again? The stock prices of the so-called Quantum Four are back on the rise today, after already accruing significant gains yesterday as well.

item.title: « Aucune action requise » : DJI tente d’éteindre l’incendie après le scandale Romo
item.description: Après la tempête médiatique déclenchée par la découverte d'une faille béante dans l'application DJI Home, la marque chinoise sort enfin du bois.

item.title: Cisco warns of critical SD-WAN security flaw which has been open since 2023
item.description: Maximum-severity Cisco flaw is being actively abused, and FCEB agencies were given just a few days to patch.

item.title: Apple dévoile son système de vérification d’âge sur iOS 26.4
item.description: La dernière bêta d’iOS 26.4 voit apparaître un système de vérification d’âge. Pensé pour prendre les devants sur les nouvelles législations en matière de protection des mineurs, ce système est pour le moment exclusif au Royaume-Uni.

item.title: How to avoid bad hires in early-stage startups
item.description: Lucena got the idea for Mappa after trying to build a marketing team but continually feeling like she had made the wrong hires.

item.title: Everything Samsung revealed at its Galaxy Unpacked event
item.description: Samsung's new privacy screen feature on Galaxy S26 Ultra was the most notable feature of the event.

item.title: Yes, the Filmmakers Behind ‘Spider-Man: Beyond the Spider-Verse’ Feel the Pressure
item.description: Producers Phil Lord and Chris Miller spoke to io9 about the highly anticipated Spidey sequel, out in 2027.

item.title: Burger King will use AI to check if employees say ‘please’ and ‘thank you’
item.description: Burger King is launching an AI chatbot that will live in the headsets used by employees. The voice-enabled chatbot, called "Patty," is part of an overarching BK Assistant platform that will not only assist employees with meal preparation but also evaluate their interactions with customers for "friendliness." Thibault Roux, Burger King's chief digital officer, tells […]...

item.title: The smart lock standard that could replace your keys is finally here
item.description: Aliro has officially arrived. The smart lock standard, first announced in 2023, finally has a 1.0 spec, meaning companies can now get hardware certified and roll out support. Aliro is an open standard designed to let any smart lock be unlocked by any smartphone, regardless of manufacturer. It stores a digital key in your phone's […]

item.title: The best budget cameras for 2026
item.description: Like other electronics products, cameras have shot up in price in the US of late due to tariffs and other reasons. Fortunately, there are still many models available for less than the price of a budget smartphone ($750 or less) that offer great features for creators and photographers alike. If it’s speed you want for sports or action shots of your kids, models like Canon’s R50 can shoot bursts as fast as many high-end cameras. Creators, meanwhile, can choose Sony’s ZV-E10 for vlogging jobs. There are also great, and cheap, models in the action and gimbal camera categories. Which one to pick th...

item.title: The rise of “always-on” accounting for rental businesses
item.description: It represents a larger evolution in how small businesses operate. For most of modern business history, accounting has been something leaders looked at periodically. Numbers were reviewed and reports arrived on a schedule (often monthly, quarterly, or at tax time). Accounting happened when there was time, not necessarily when insight was needed.
